findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25% by calling the `setMarketingFeePercent` function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting `_maxTxAmount` to zero.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit by calling the `setMarketingFeePercent` function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `setMarketingFeePercent` function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to pause transactions for everyone else except him
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of a reasonable percentage of liquidity taken by dev wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling tokens.
